input: I saw a wallet on the ground and
My neighbor asked to borrow my tools and
I found out my friend's secret and
The cashier gave me too much change and
I saw someone struggling to carry groceries and
My coworker made a mistake and the boss asked who did it, so
I was driving and saw an elderly person trying to cross the street, so
My friend trusted me with their password and
I noticed my neighbor's door was unlocked when they were away, so
Someone dropped their phone in front of me and
